title: Qualitative Case Study-Based Workshop for Enhancing Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education experience and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening instructional design capabilities in social sector education linked to learners' work environments, targeting professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Analyze and present educational technology utilization strategies based on learner types (three dispositional profiles)
Develop a TEL (Technology-Enhanced Learning) design framework integrating social context and technological requirements of assignments
Propose learner-customized TEL solutions based on case study data analysis
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
